solution_line_template: Brenden caught {brendan_morning_fish} fish in the morning + {brendan_afternoon_fish} in the afternoon = <<{brendan_morning_fish}+{brendan_afternoon_fish}={brendan_total_caught}>>{brendan_total_caught} fish.
